data.actual_result: Status context menu has more length between Idle & DnD on Canary since the recent style changes (d1-m9-y18)
data.expected_result: Status context menus should be identical height
data.short_description: Status context menu has more length between Idle & DnD on Canary compared to Stable
data.steps_to_repro: - Have both Canary & Stable installed - Compare the status context menus on both (Taking a screenshot of one then the other to compare is the easiest way)
